quote: Big thinking precedes great achievement.
The achievement of your goal is assured the moment you commit yourself to it.
Don't mistake activity for achievement.
Art, the one achievement of Man which has made the long trip up from all fours seem well advised.
Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement.
Every great achievement is the victory of a flaming heart.
Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.

Even a mistake may turn out to be the one thing necessary to a worthwhile achievement.
Every great achievement is the victory of a flaming heart.
Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
Freedom is an internal achievement rather than an external adjustment.
Great achievement is usually born of great sacrifice, and is never the result of selfishness.
Happiness does not lie in happiness, but in the achievement of it.
Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
I attempt an arduous task; but there is no worth in that which is not a difficult achievement.
I don't confuse greatness with perfection. To be great anyhow isâ€¦the higher achievement.
Let freedom reign. The sun never set on so glorious a human achievement.
Look upon your chastening as God's chariots sent to carry your soul into the high places of spiritual achievement.
My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
Never mistake activity for achievement.
Never mistake activity for achievement.
Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
Periods of tranquillity are seldom prolific of creative achievement. Mankind has to be stirred up.
Poetry is the achievement of the synthesis of hyacinths and biscuits.
Spectacular achievement is always preceded by spectacular preparation.
Success has always been easy to measure. It is the distance between one's origins and one's final achievement.
The greatest achievement of the human spirit is to live up to one's opportunities and make the most of one's resources.
The mind must see visual achievement of the purpose before action is initiated.
The starting point of all achievement is desire.
The virtue of achievement is victory over oneself. Those who know this can never know defeat.
There is no achievement without goals.
To know the will of God is the greatest knowledge! To do the will of God is the greatest achievement.
